abstract: The Coca-Cola Company said yesterday that profit fell 22 percent after its largest bottler wrote down the value of its North American unit on reduced soda sales and higher raw material costs.
snippet: The Coca-Cola Company said yesterday that profit fell 22 percent after its largest bottler wrote down the value of its North American unit on reduced soda sales and higher raw material costs.
lead_paragraph: The Coca-Cola Company said yesterday that profit fell 22 percent after its largest bottler wrote down the value of its North American unit on reduced soda sales and higher raw material costs.

headline.main: Profit Falls at Coca-Cola as Sales Slow but Costs Rise
headline.print_headline: Profit Falls At Coca-Cola As Sales Slow But Costs Rise
